name: Magic Wands for Halloween
author: lkmiec
summary: Fantastically festive for Halloween, Harry Potter-themed parties, or your daughter's Princess birthday party! Use frosting and sprinkles of any color variety you prefer. Tons of fun to do with the kids and a great presentation!
ingredients: 3 drops orange food coloring, or as needed  (Optional)
½ cup multicolored candy sprinkles, or to taste
directions: Add orange food coloring to 1 bowl; mix until blended
Line a medium glass container with waxed paper
Spread frosting over the top half of each pretzel rod
Roll in sprinkles until heavily covered
Place rods upright in the prepared container to harden and dry
